asw1022.model.dixit

Class GameExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • asw1022.model.dixit.GameExecution

  • public class GameExecution
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps the state of a single game execution (a match).

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player p)
               throws GameException
        Adds a player to the match.

        When all the players have joined the match, the game starts and the moves to the "setPhrase" phase.

        Parameters:
        p - The player.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase or if no more players can be added.

      • setPhrase

        public void setPhrase(Player p,
             java.lang.String phrase)
               throws GameException
        It allows the player that owns the turn to provide the clue.

        When the player has given his/her clue, the game moves to the "select" phase.

        Parameters:
        p - The player.
        phrase - The clue.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase or if the player that made the request does not own the turn.

      • selectCard

        public void selectCard(Player p,
              java.lang.String cardName)
                throws GameException
        It allows a player to select the card identified by cardName argument.

        When all the players have selected their card, the game moves to the "Vote" phase.

        Parameters:
        p - The player.
        cardName - The (unique) name of the card.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase, if the player has already selected a card, or if the card does not belong to the player.

      • pickCardFromDeck

        public void pickCardFromDeck(Player p)
        It allows the player p to pick the card at the top of the deck,
        Parameters:
        p - The player.

      • vote

        public void vote(Player voter,
        java.lang.String cardName)
          throws GameException
        It allows a player to vote the card identified by the cardName argument.

        When all the players (except the player that owns the turn) have voted, the game moves to the "Results" phase or to the "End" phase if any player has reached to max number of points.

        Parameters:
        voter - The player.
        cardName - The (unique) name of the card.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase, if the player has already voted, or if the player is trying to vote the card he/she has selected previously.

      • CalculatePoints

        protected void CalculatePoints()
        It updates the results for the current round.

        The player that owns the turn receives 3 points if at least one player (but not all the players) has voted his/her card. The players that voted that card are given 3 points as well. Moreover, each player gets 1 point for each vote has been assigned to his/her card. Otherwise, if all or none of the players have voted the card of the player that owns the turn, the latter receives no points (0), and all the players receive 2 points.

      • proceed

        public void proceed(Player player)
             throws GameException
        It allows a player to signal his/her intention to proceed to the next round.

        When all the players have notified their intention to proceed, the turn goes to the next player and a new round starts.

        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase.

      • nextTurn

        protected Player nextTurn()
                   throws GameException
        It determines the next player of turn and the game moves to the "setPhrase" phase.
        Returns:
        the next player that owns the turn.
        Throws:
        GameException - if the request is made in the wrong phase.
